roles.title: WebSite Updates
roles.description: Help keep the Innovate QA website fresh, accurate, and engaging by updating content, event information, and community resources.
benefits: Networking opportunities with industry leaders and peers
requirements: Basic experience with website content management or web tools
Strong attention to detail and communication skills
Ability to meet deadlines and follow brand guidelines
Interest in QA, tech, or community building

roles.title: Speaker Management & Coordination
roles.description: Support Innovate QA speakers by coordinating communications, schedules, and session details to ensure a smooth and professional conference experience.
benefits: Direct exposure to industry leaders and speakers
requirements: Strong organizational and communication skills
Comfortable coordinating via email, chat, and shared documents
Attention to detail in schedules, bios, and session materials

roles.title: Event Volunteer
roles.description: Help make the conference run smoothly by assisting with registration, room management, and attendee support.
requirements: Available for full conference days
Friendly and helpful attitude
Good communication skills

roles.title: Sponsor Liaison
roles.description: Help manage sponsor relationships, booth setup, and ensure sponsors have a great experience.
requirements: Professional communication skills
Experience in event coordination preferred
Available during setup and event days

roles.title: Content Creator
roles.description: Capture the conference through photography, videography, live tweeting, or blog posts.
requirements: Portfolio of previous work
Own equipment preferred
Social media savvy

roles.title: Award Reviewer & Evaluation Committee
roles.description: Help recognize excellence in quality engineering and innovation by reviewing nominations, evaluating submissions, and supporting fair and transparent award decisions.
benefits: Hands-on experience in industry evaluation and recognition
Visibility as a trusted community contributor
requirements: Background or strong interest in QA, testing, or software engineering
Ability to review submissions objectively and confidentially
Availability during the award review period
Commitment to fairness, integrity, and community values
